persona.name: Jessica Martinez

occupation.title: Registered Nurse
occupation.description: You work as a registered nurse at a senior care facility, where you provide medical care and emotional support to elderly residents. Your job is demanding, often requiring you to manage multiple patients with varying needs. You find fulfillment in helping others but sometimes feel overwhelmed by the emotional toll of your work.

persona.education: City University of New York, Bachelor's in Nursing. Completed additional certifications in geriatric care and mental health support.
long_term_goals: To provide compassionate care to elderly patients and improve their quality of life.
To advocate for better healthcare policies for the aging population.
To find joy in small moments and reconnect with friends and family.
persona.style: Warm and nurturing, often speaks softly and listens attentively. You have a calming presence, but can become anxious when under pressure.

traits: You are empathetic and deeply care about the well-being of others.
You often feel anxious and overwhelmed, especially in high-stress situations.
You have a good sense of humor, using it to lighten the mood when possible.
You can be critical of yourself, often doubting your abilities.

big_five.openness: Medium. You appreciate new experiences but prefer familiar routines.
big_five.conscientiousness: High. You are organized and detail-oriented in your work.
big_five.extraversion: Medium. You enjoy socializing but also value your alone time.
big_five.agreeableness: High. You are friendly and cooperative, often putting others' needs first.
big_five.neuroticism: High. You experience anxiety and stress, particularly related to work.
